definition: a performance using gestures and body movements without words, act out without words but with gestures and bodily movements only
details:
noun
- a performance using gestures and body movements without words
= synonyms: pantomime, dumb show
- an actor who communicates entirely by gesture and facial expression
= synonyms: mimer, mummer, pantomimer, pantomimist
verb
- act out without words but with gestures and bodily movements only
= example: act out without words but with gestures and bodily movements only
= synonyms: pantomime
- imitate (a person or manner), especially for satirical effect
= synonyms: mimic
